content: The #TempleofHeaven served as a sacred space for Ming and Qing emperors to pray for bountiful harvests. In this episode of "#Beijing: #MoreThanMeetstheEye," Zhao Chengwei introduces the ancient #sanxian, blending architectural marvels and traditional #music.
Happy #ChineseNewYear 2025! Hope to meet you in Beijing soon. Welcome to Visit Beijing!

We’re live from Shijia Hutong Museum, where the story of Beijing begins not with monuments, but with the everyday life found in hutongs. These winding alleyways hold generations of memories — of neighbors, traditions, and changing times. Through this museum, we’ll explore how hutongs reflect the depth and beauty of Beijing’s cultural heritage. Follow along as we trace the roots of the city from the ground up. #ShijiaHutong #ShijiaHutongMuseum #BeijingCulture #Hutong #Siheyuan #Courtyard #OldBeijing #CulturalHeritage #HiddenBeijing #TraditionalChina #BeijingVibes #BeijingLive #VisitBeijing #Beijing

Rooted in Chinese tradition and refined aesthetics, Huang Ting at the Peninsula Beijing offers a dining experience marked by heritage and quiet sophistication. From intricate wooden décor to the soft glow of lanterns, every detail speaks to a timeless cultural elegance. To mark the Dragon Boat Festival, the restaurant presents handcrafted zongzi—fragrant rice dumplings wrapped in bamboo leaves and thoughtfully packaged in exclusive Peninsula gift boxes. These seasonal delicacies, rich in meaning and flavor, make for exquisite gifts or personal treats, honoring the beauty of tradition through a lens of modern luxury. Celebrate the season with taste and grace: #ThePeninsulaBeijing #HuangTing #DragonBoatFestival #Zongzi #ChineseTradition #RefinedDining #LuxuryCelebration #CulturalCuisine #BeijingLive #VisitBeijing #Beijing

The #DrumTower, located on #Beijing’s #centralaxis in Dongcheng District, is a Yuan Dynasty relic. Its red walls and gray tiles with green glazed edges offer stunning views of #hutongs and modern towers—a true blend of history and modernity. #VisitBeijing

Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of #HuanghuachengLakesideGreatWall this #autumn! As the leaves transform into vibrant hues, the tranquil waters reflect the stunning landscape, creating a mesmerizing scene that whispers tales of history and nature. #GreatWall #VisitBeijing

Ganjiakou Station on Line 16 sits on #Sanlihe Road in Haidian. With Chinese aesthetics inspired by the “autumn scenery of Sanlihe,” its ginkgo-themed design echoes nearby Ginkgo Avenue—one of #Beijing’s most photographed spots. #BeijingSubway #VisitBeijing

In #HuairouDistrict, #Beijing, the #Huanghuacheng #LakesideGreatWall stands unrivaled. When winter blankets the landscape in snow, the #GreaWall transforms into a silver fairyland, conjuring a magnificent panorama that paints a picture of awe-inspiring mountains and rivers.

Hong'en #Temple, situated at the northern end of #Beijing's #CentralAxis, near the #BellandDrumTower, marks the "dragon's tail." After renovation, it reopened, aspiring to be a new landmark in Beijing’s urban renewal and culture. #IconicBeijing #VisitBeijing

Explore China with the #240hourvisafree transit policy! Travelers from eligible countries can explore 24 provinces #visafree for up to 10 days. With entry via & , discover the #GreatWall, #ForbiddenCity & more! #Beijing240HGuide #VisitBeijing #Beijing

Famous (#Taco Kitchen, #Cafe, #Wine, #BrewPub) is a versatile "music + food + AR" spot in #Beijing. With its industrial design, record players, and electric guitars, it hosts live jazz and rock at night. Enjoy Mexican food in cozy booths with family and friends! #VisitBeijing

A #Shanghai #Shikumen-style building stands out as Tai'anli New Urban District. Transformed from a century-old Shanghai-style structure into a cultural and art center, it's now a favored spot for young people. #StrollinBeijing #VisitBeijing

The National #Museum of Classic Books features a spacious environment and extensive collections. Its exhibitions on Chinese traditional cultural classics are organized chronologically, offering insights into China’s cultural heritage. #BeijingMuseums #VisitBeijing

The Star #Theater is a creative hub with unique decor and a strong artistic character. It hosts small theaters, art exhibitions, cafes, bars, and restaurants, making it a great place to hang out and enjoy culture, focused on original drama. #VisitBeijing #Beijing

Join the "#GreatWallHero" campaign! Share your photos of the #GreatWall, #Beijing, or the #CentralAxis in the comments and tell us your story. We’ll feature top entries on ! Don’t miss this chance to showcase your adventure to the world. #ChinaTravel #VisitBeijing

The #HuguangGuildHall, dating back to the #QingDynasty, symbolizes assembly, opera, and scholar cultures, anchoring #Beijing's heritage. Amid Liulichang and Taoranting, it's steeped in history. #VisitBeijing #ChinaTravel

#Beijing’s #Sanlitun embraces a unique #autumn vibe, with golden leaves painting the street in warm colors. Fashion boutiques and art shops sit in perfect harmony, while the scent of coffee and delicious food fills the air, inviting you to linger. #VisitBeijing

Capybaras are the new craze for families and trendsetters! Check out the Capybara-themed #popupstore at #HopsonOneMall in #Beijing, where you’ll find fun games and playful cartoon characters that bring smiles to everyone. #FamilyAdventure #VisitBeijing

Discover the charm of Liaogongzhuang Station, a highlight of the west extension of #BeijingSubway Line 6. With striking circular patterns and 8 vibrant mosaic murals, this station turns underground travel into an artistic journey. #VisitBeijing #ArtInTransit

Guanyuan #Park offers a delightful escape from the city's hustle and bustle, providing locals with a peaceful retreat. With lush trees and vibrant flowers, a leisurely stroll here offers a glimpse into the laid-back charm of #Beijing life. #VisitBeijing

Along the #LiangmaRiver in #ChaoyangDistrict of #Beijing, amidst the bustling CBD and vibrant nightlife, the blooming peach trees paint a stunning springtime panorama. As night falls, the riverside lights up with shimmering brilliance, casting a magical spell. #Springtime

Located on the South Fourth Ring Road, Zhongxing Flower Market is one of Beijing's most famous spots for #flower lovers. With 7 exhibition halls and a sprawling open-air market, it's a treasure trove of potted flowers, succulents, and green plants. #VisitBeijing #Beijing

The #NationalArtMuseumofChina (#NAMOC) in #Beijing, a revered national cultural landmark, delighted visitors during the #YearoftheDragon with an enticing #exhibition featuring intricate Chinese red #papercut artworks. #VisitBeijing

Located in Nanyang #Hutong, Metal Hands, the artisan #coffeeshop features unique decor combining fashion with traditional art. The mix of industrial style and retro art offers a distinct #coffee culture experience, perfect for a relaxing afternoon. #VisitBeijing

Experience the stunning scenery of the #Mutianyu #GreatWall and immerse yourself in the breathtaking sea of clouds! With the 144-hour transit #visafree policy, exploring this iconic wonder has never been easier for international travelers. 郭志伟 #144HoursVisaFree #Beijing

The art installation at Xibahe (West Ba River) station on #BeijingSubway Line 17, centers on the theme inspired by Ba River culture. It incorporates the motif of "fish" from ancient Chinese jade, blending into the station's decor for a harmonious space design. #VisitBeijing

thebONE Fashion Block is a top spot for #GenerationZ, featuring art, #fashion, #anime, and cutting-edge tech. Located near the #OlympicCenter, it’s a cultural hub where you can let your imagination run wild, and stay ahead of the trends. #VisitBeijing #Beijing

#PekingUniversity, founded in 1898 in #Beijing's Haidian District, ranks among China's top universities. Known for its deep historical roots, academic achievements, and scenic campus, it offers a profound cultural experience. #VisitBeijing

Daguanying Station is a key interchange for Line 7 and Line 16 of the #BeijingSubway. The Line 16 platform features a thematic design inspired by ancient #Beijing, blending "teahouses" and "drama stages" for an immersive experience celebrating the city's cultural heritage.

In Xicheng District, the #Yuetan (#AltaroftheMoon) once bore witness to solemn moon god sacrifices by Ming and Qing Dynasty emperors. Today, the park teems with life, as #wintersweet slowly unfurls its petals, a cherished emblem of integrity and honor. #VisitBeijing #Beijing

In the #Beijing Sub-Center, the #BeijingPerformingArtsCentre blends classics and modernity, featuring plays from the #NCPA alongside modern musicals and dances. With its first-class design and facilities, it's a must-visit cultural landmark. #VisitBeijing

"The Integrating with Nature—Commemorating the 70th Anniversary of Li Keran's Sketching" debuts at #BeijingFineArtAcademy on March 29th. Celebrating #LiKeran, pivotal in 20th-century Chinese art. With 70 sketches, it honors his profound legacy. #InkandInspiration

#BeihangUniversity, a leader in scientific research, features a campus that blends modern and traditional architecture, inspiring students and visitors with its commitment to academic excellence. #BeijingCampusTours #VisitBeijing

Yandun #Park features the "Yandun" cultural site on its eastern side, a key landmark in the southern extension of the city's iconic #centralaxis. As the #autumnequinox arrives, Yandun Park becomes a serene haven, where gentle breezes carry the whispers of leaves. #VisitBeijing

The Chinese calendar marks the arrival of the Spring Equinox, signaling the return of sunshine and warmer temperatures. Along with this, the magnolia flowers are beginning to bloom in the Forbidden City, Taimiao, Summer Palace and other places. #visitbeijing

The Beijing Biennale, one of the major art events for this year, presents topics such as the future, technology and traditional Chinese culture, giving audiences a comprehensive understanding of the concept of Symbiosis. #visitbeijing

#BeijingFineArtAcademy is the first and largest professional #art academy established since the PRC. It brings together outstanding painters and a wealth of artworks. The academy focuses on artistic creation and hosts exhibitions to promote cultural exchange. #VisitBeijing

Explore #TeamLab Massless #Beijing at Chaoyang Joy City mall. Crafted by renowned TeamLab, this exhibition invites you to discover 10,000 sqm of boundless creativity. Experience the seamless fusion of self and surroundings in this captivating digital display.

Nowadays, you can find "old Beijing fried bean sauce noodles" everywhere in the capital. There are also many other flavors of noodles which make up Beijing snacks. During the Chinese New Year, every household often has a variety of noodles on the table. #visitbeijing

ChooChoo Coffee is a renowned coffeeshop tucked away in a #Beijing #hutong (alley). Its exterior resembles a #vintage train, complete with wooden revolving doors. With a cup of #coffee in hand, the journey into today's coffee experience begins. #VisitBeijing

Changchuntang Pharmacy, an esteemed brand established in 1795, has recently opened a new affiliated teahouse called "Tea of Season." The teahouse is situated adjacent to the iconic Peking University Red Building. #visitbeijing

The Chinese Ethnic Culture Park is situated in the southern part of the Olympic Park in Beijing. It is a vast cultural hub that combines cultural exhibitions, singing and dancing performances, traditional housing displays, as well as artistic craftsmanship. #visitbeijing

The #ImperialGarden is located along the #centralaxis of the #ForbiddenCity. It was originally built in the 18th year of Yongle in the #Mingdynasty. This beautiful #garden embodies the essence of Chinese garden culture, making it an unmissable #attraction. #VisitBeijing

#ArcticOcean (#Beibingyang) soda, a cherished childhood favorite among #Beijingers, takes center stage at the Arctic Ocean & Yili E Park. This comprehensive theme #park offers entertainment, experiential learning and educational experiences. #VisitBeijing

In 1935, #QiBaishi created a masterpiece with the theme of "teaching the child." Proudly displayed in #NationalArtMuseumofChina, this captivating artwork stands as a testament to the cultural richness and #heritage of #Beijing. #VisitBeijing

The Light of Ancient Roman Civilization, the masterpieces from National Archaeological Museum of Naples (MANN), has been unveiled in China Millennium Monument.The exhibition features 69 sets of heritages and antiques in ancient Roman. #ArtExhibition #ArtCollections #VisitBeijing

Guyu, which literally means "Grain Rain," is the sixth solar term of the Chinese lunar calendar, and is associated with peony flowers. The China National Botanical Garden is an ideal place for those interested in peony. #VisitBeijing

#GreatWallHero #BeijingCentralAxis #CentralAxis #beijinghistory #beijingculture #OnlyInBeijing #TempleofHeaven #Tiantan Temple of Heaven, Dongcheng DistrictPhotographed by LIU Guilin Image Source：Competition for the Transmission and Promotion of Beijing

Nanhaizi Park is the largest wetland in Beijing. As the royal hunting ground of the Liao, Jin, Yuan, Ming and Qing dynasties, it has been listed as one of the “Ten Scenes of Yanjing” (Yanjing being a former name of present-day Beijing). #visitbeijing #beijingnature

#CishouTemple, built during the fourth year of the Wanli reign in the #MingDynasty, features a tall and solemn #tower structure. With an octagonal design comprising 13 floors, it boasts intricately carved #Buddhastatues and unique musical instrument motifs. #VisitBeijing

Nicknamed as Beijing’s closest place to the Galaxy, the Phoenix Center notably represents post-modern arts. Inspired by Mobius Band, it’s delicately designed by Mr. Shao Weiping, a famous Chinese architect. #VisitBeijing

Qi Baishi, a master of modern Chinese art, has a cherry painting that is part of the collection of the Beijing Fine Art Academy. Similarly, artists such as Jacob van Hulsdonck have produced still life paintings featuring fruits and vegetables, including cherries. #visitbeijing

#GreatWallHero #BeijingCentralAxis #CentralAxis #beijingsight #beijingattraction #beijinglife #visitbeijing #BellTower Bell Tower, Dongcheng District Photographed by ZHU Yunxia Image Source：Competition for the Transmission and Promotion of Beijing Central Axis

#GreatWallHero #BeijingCentralAxis #CentralAxis #beijingscenery #visitbeijing #beijingcity #beijinglandmarks #beijingculture Shichahai, Xicheng District Photographed by WU Chaoying Image Source：Competition for the Transmission and Promotion of Beijing Central Axis

SKP #Beijing, situated in the heart of the #CBD, is a comprehensive fashion hub. Offering shopping, dining, and entertainment, it houses top global luxury brands, making it a must-visit for fashion enthusiasts. #VisitBeijing
Beijing's renowned eateries allure tourists. Alexandre Adrien, ambassador for "Beijing's Delightful Flavors," sampled #Shaomai, explored #HuguosiSnackStreet, and savored Bianyifang's #Pekingduck.

As the #NewYear approaches and heavy #snow falls, people continue to come and go at the #LamaTemple. It serves as a place for devout Buddhist believers to pray, worship, and study Buddhist teachings, attracting numerous visitors who come to explore. #CapitalCharm #VisitBeijing

While wealth and honor are common dreams, few artists capture them on paper. #QiBaishi, however, depicted this with remarkable frankness. Whether for professional reasons or personal experience, he expressed this longing warmly and calmly in his brushstrokes. #InkandInspiration

Join Jood in exploring the beauty of #autumn in #Beijing. In Beijing's autumn, every scene is a picturesque moment, weaving together an unforgettable memory of the season. #AutumnInBeijing #BeijingBeauty #ExploreBeijing #CulturalExchange #FourSeasonsBeijing #VisitBeijing
Just so you know, #DaxingAirport is about 50km south of #Beijing city center on the north-south #CentralAxis.

The Yanqing Winter Olympic Village is located at the foot of the Xiaohaituo Mountain in Yanqing District. Visitors can take the cable car here to enjoy the charming scenery, especially the delightful snow-capped mountains. Photographed by Jing ZHANG #visitbeijing #beijingwinter

At the 3rd #BeijingInternationalCanalArtsFest, Swiss music group #SophieDeQuay performed their new song "Ni Neng Ting Dao Wo Ma" in Chinese for the first time. The group was warmly received by the audience and honored as "Envoy of Canal Cultural Exchange." #VisitBeijing #Beijing

The #Beijing Inbound #Tourism Development Conference kicked off on May 24, creating a vibrant platform for Chinese and international travel agencies to connect and collaborate. 260 attendees joined the opening ceremony. #GlobalTravel #TourismConference #VisitBeijing

Many customs accompany the Spring Festival. Cleaning the house, pasting Spring Festival couplets, worshiping ancestors, as well as eating dumplings and glutinous rice balls remain popular today just as people did several thousand years ago. #SpringFestival #ChineseNewYear

In 2023, the #BeijingAncientArchitectureMusicFestival highlighted #centralaxis landmarks, featuring 10 concerts. The #BellTower and #DrumTower embody #Beijing's rich history. Resonating with musicians' melodies, they evoke a cultural monument. #BeijingCulture #VisitBeijing

The CIFTIS 2023 is on full swing. In Shougang Park, exhibition halls No.1 and No.2 present how interaction enriches culture and tourism services. Before September 6, come and have fun with us! #CIFTIS #2023CIFTIS #CIFTISNews #Beijinglife #VisitBeijing

Minor Snow is the second #solarterm in #winter. In the heart of winter, red #plumblossoms burst forth with boldness, symbolizing unwavering resilience and unyielding integrity. Explore #QiBaishi's celebrated red plum masterpiece at #BeijingFineArtAcademy. #VisitBeijing

Discover #Beijing showcases the city's culture and tourism through a foreigner's eyes. In this episode, Mr. Mohamed Jihad from Egypt embarks on a "dragon-seeking tour" to uncover #dragon legends from #BeihaiPark to the #GreatWall. Join the adventure! #DragonCulture #VisitBeijing

Discover the magic of #Beijing with #AirChina's routes from #LatinAmerica! Now offering direct flights from #SãoPaulo and #Havana to Beijing, we're making it easier for you to explore the rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning sights of Beijing. #ChinaTravel #VisitBeijing

#BeijingDongyueTemple stands as a testament to #history. It not only safeguards architectural #wonders from the Yuan, Ming and Qing dynasties, but also treasures a wealth of stone relics, intricate colored #sculptures, Ming Dynasty #paintings and other #relics. #VisitBeijing

The #FivePagodaTemple is home to two majestic #ginkgo trees, adorned with lush branches bearing golden leaves. These revered trees were planted during the #temple's construction in the #MingDynasty, making them over 600 years old. #VisitBeijing

#DiscoverBeijing is a video series exploring the ancient capital's contemporary cultural charm through foreign perspectives. In The #ChimneyTour, join Mr. Mohamed Jihad from Egypt as he visits the #798ArtZone, 751D·PARK, #ShougangPark, and a unique café hidden in a chimney.

The Happy #ChineseNewYear gala was filled with delightful surprises, epitomized by the unique interpretation of “In the Spring Mountains,” a Chinese #NewYear classic infused with authentic Nigerian creativity. #SpringFestival #YearoftheSnake #CulturalExchange #VisitBeijing

#Tokyo to #Beijing with #AirChina's direct flight! Experience China's vibrant capital firsthand, from the CBD to the majestic #GreatWall. Discover the rich flavors of Beijing cuisine and embrace the fusion of tradition and modernity. #VisitBeijing

How can a small shop go global? A staff member at a popular #café says: "Convenient payments make customers feel at home." With China’s 240-hour #visafree transit policy, exploring #Beijing is easier than ever. Plan your 2025 trip! #Visa #VisitBeijing #ChinaTravel #EasyTravel
Just a quick correction: Madian Park is actually in Haidian District, Beijing.

Let's visit the #DrumTower along the #CentralAxis! "#BeijingCentralAxis: A Building Ensemble Exhibiting the Ideal Order of the Chinese Capital" has been inscribed on the #UNESCOWorldHeritage List on July 27, becoming China's 59th World Heritage Site. #ChinaTravel #VisitBeijing

In #Tongzhou, #Beijing, you'll find the Berry Beans Xinhua Street store housed in a charming red building. Its #retro-style architecture offers a warm and inviting atmosphere, making it a go-to spot for young visitors seeking #Instagram-worthy shots. #BeijingLifeStyle

From Jan 20 to 24, the "Hello, Beijing" inbound tourism promotion series was successfully held in Turkey. The event showcased #Beijing's unique charm as a historic cultural city and a global travel destination. #InboundTourism #CulturalHeritage #TourismPromotion #VisitBeijing
Thank you very much for your advice~ They really enjoyed playing games with the locals.
Thanks for your support!
This season is perfect for travel. Autumn in Beijing is breathtaking, with stunning sights everywhere.
We'll continue updating this series with travel tips for Beijing. Stay tuned for more!
Thanks for your love
Delighted you like it. Hope to meet you in Beijing one day.
So glad you like it!
Appreciate your visit to our page.
Thank you for your kind words! It's indeed a testament to China's rich and ancient history, blending tradition and modern efforts to preserve its heritage.
Glad you think so. Please subscribe us for more about beautiful Beijing.
Thanks for your sharing
It is true! Thanks for your continued attention to us.
A classic line from Shakespeare, always a reminder of the power and beauty of words.
Thanks for your support!
It’s wonderful to connect with you across the world. Wishing you all the best!
Thanks! Welcome to Beijing.
Glad you think so.

Thank you so much for your kind words!
Yes, Beijing is indeed a great place to visit.
